attributes.action: Reduce cancelled insurance disclosure to 5 years in line with claims/convictions
attributes.background: At present having cancelled insurance affects you for life , wheras someone with convictions doesn't have to disclose that after 5 years. This seems inappropriate and unfair to regular everyday people. Insurance companies are compulsory yet seem barely regulated and free to do whatever they please.

rejection.details: We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. This is a matter for insurance providers.
